mapper.insert: insert into parent_list(job_board_no, userid, care_addr, time_type, pw_activity, wish_wage, consultation, wish_age, wish_gender, content, lat, lng, writedate, hit) values(member_sq.nextval, #{userid}, #{care_addr}, #{time_type}, #{pw_activity}, #{wish_wage}, #{consultation}, #{wish_age}, #{wish_gender}, #{content}, #{lat}, #{lng}, sysdate, 0)
insert into add_child(job_board_no, child_birth, userid) values(member_sq.currval, #{cVO.child_birth}, #{rbVO.userid})
insert into jb_specific_day(job_board_no, select_date, start_time, end_time) values(member_sq.currval, #{sdVO.select_date}, #{sdVO.start_time}, #{sdVO.end_time})

insert into jb_regular_date(job_board_no, yoil, start_time, end_time, start_date, end_date) values(member_sq.currval, #{rdVO.yoil}, #{rdVO.start_time}, #{rdVO.end_time}, #{rdVO.start_date}, #{rdVO.end_date})
mapper.select: select p.job_board_no, p.userid, p.care_addr, p.time_type, p.pw_activity, p.wish_age, p.wish_wage, p.consultation, p.wish_gender, p.content, to_char(p.writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') writedate, p.lat, p.lng, c.child_birth from parent_list p, add_child c where c.userid = #{param1} and c.userid = p.userid and p.job_board_no = c.job_board_no
